Dialogue.Page: Mod: Ernesto's Fun Day Off Authors: TextureTurtle
Ernesto's Fun Day Off is a mod made for the second mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community.
While the mod is essentially filled with meta satire, there are puzzles to solve like any other Outer Wilds story mod, along with a hidden mechanic.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
